translation.en: [Scarlett] I just sent you a mission brief.

translation.en: I've been keeping tabs on an old friend of mine
translation.vi: I've been keeping tabson an old friend of mine

translation.en: who just landed in Japan. I don't think it's a coincidence.

translation.vi: [Scarlett] Along with 200 other passengerson the same train,

translation.en: She's been linked to bombings, assassinations,
translation.vi: She's been linked to bombings,assassinations,

translation.en: and civil unrest everywhere from Nanzhao to Barovia.
translation.vi: and civil unrest everywherefrom Nanzhao to Barovia.

translation.en: If Kenta's linked up with the Baroness, the threat to you is significant.
translation.vi: If Kenta's linked up with the Baroness,the threat to you is significant.

translation.en: A little late to grow a conscience, don't you think?
translation.vi: A little late to grow a conscience,don't you think?

translation.en: There is no reason this triangle of ours can't be purely transactional.

translation.en: That rock you want me to steal, it's for Cobra, isn't it?
translation.vi: That rock you want me to steal,it's for Cobra, isn't it?

translation.en: And we have something you want. Now of course,
translation.vi: And we have something you want.Now of course,

translation.en: if you've had a change of heart, you are free to go.
translation.vi: if you've had a change of heart,you are free to go.

translation.en: But I promise you, back out now and you will never see him again.
translation.vi: But I promise you, back out nowand you will never see him again.

translation.vi: Are you sure you're readyto give up the hunt

translation.vi: When I tried to find out why,it was as if he didn't exist.

translation.en: I will be the last of our family to lead the Arashikage.
translation.vi: I will be the last of our familyto lead the Arashikage.

translation.en: I only used the Jewel to defend our people.

translation.vi: Our clan swore an oathto never use the Jewel,

translation.en: Tommy, to forever serve the clan in any capacity.
translation.vi: Tommy, to forever serve the clanin any capacity.

translation.vi: -I have sacrificed everything!-Tommy.

translation.en: -I'm going after Tommy. -I had a feeling you might.

translation.en: Are you sure that's wise? In his state, who knows what he might do.

translation.en: My commander, General Joe Colton, wanted to share this with you.
translation.vi: My commander, General Joe Colton,wanted to share this with you.

translation.vi: You'll find no record of you in there.He kept you off the grid to protect you.

translation.vi: Your father infiltrated a Cobra cell.But they found out.
